description.narrative: Evidence on the impact of Girls' Iron-Folate Tablet Supplementation (GIFTS) Programme Northern and Volta regions stimulated government to scale-up nationally, and UNICEF revamps the Scaling Up Nutrition Development Partners coordination framework. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/01/2020
